div.head: 陰下痿
div.div: dysfunction of the yin [i.e. the male member] remaining below

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: dysfunction of the yin [i.e. the male member] remaining below

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with yin wei 陰痿 , yin dysfunction. Yao xing lun 藥性論 Substance Entry bai ji 白及：主陰 下痿，治面上皯皰 , “It controls dysfunction of the yin [i.e. male member] remaining below , and cures facial blisters”.
